item.description:
At our Future Food and Fun meetup at the Wholesome Café we decided it’s time to start up our book club discussions again. 

  After the summer hiatus a new meeting place is needed. So, I reserved the Trustees' meeting room at the Concord Library (main branch).

  Last book club we agreed on reading The Inner Art of Vegetarianism: Spiritual Practices for Body and Soul by Carol. J. Adams. 

  This being the first book club since, perhaps not everyone has read it or will have time to read it.  We all do so much reading on our own, we could individually talk about any vegan related book or article.  Each of us can have a few minutes to give a brief review with any recommendations.

  We can decide if we want to keep this format or if we want to go back to all reading the same book. Also, we can decide if there is a location more suitable for everyone.

http://www.concordlibrary.org/pages/general.info.html#hours
item.name: Book Club Discussion
